content: bucket hats are all the rage this summer crochet one quick with this pattern that comes in eight sizes materials needed * worsted weight yarn * crochet hooks size h or size needed to obtain gauge * tapestry needle * 1 stitch marker pattern is written in english using standard u s crochet terms level advanced beginner the pattern is available for free on my blog the benefit of purchasing this pdf pattern is to receive an ad-free version that is easy to print and read if you have any questions while you are working on your project please feel free to email me at crafting pattern@gmail com and i will do my best to answer your questions and give you help for more crochet project ideas please visit craftingeachday com © 2022 crafting each day do not copy sell or reproduce this pattern without my permission
